original: etāstā devatā agniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca

original: māsāste vāsantikau dvau graiṣmau dvau vārṣikau dvau śāradau
analyzed: māsāḥ te vāsantikau dvau graiṣmau dvau vārṣikau dvau śāradau

analyzed: yā prathamā daśa dayam sa lokaḥ yā dvitīyā antarikṣam tat yā tṛtīyā

original: dyauḥ semameva lokam prathamayā daśatārohannantarikṣaṃ dvitīyayā divaṃ

original: tṛtīyayā tathaivaitadyajamāna imameva lokam prathamayā daśatā rohatyantarikṣaṃ
analyzed: tṛtīyayā tathā eva etat yajamānaḥ imam eva lokam prathamayā daśatā rohati antarikṣam

sa sa parāṅ iva rohaḥ

original: iyamu vai pratiṣṭhā te devā imām
analyzed: iyam u vai pratiṣṭhā te devāḥ imām
pratiṣṭhām abhipratyāyan tathā eva etat yajamānaḥ imām pratiṣṭhām abhipratyaiti atha

original: yottamā daśadayaṃ sa lokastasmādyathaiva prathamāyai daśataḥ
analyzed: yā uttamā daśa dayam sa lokaḥ tasmāt yathā eva prathamāyai daśatas
prabhṛtiḥ evam uttamāyai samānam hi etat yat ete daśatau ayam eva lokaḥ
tāḥ vai etāḥ catvāriṃśat iṣṭakāḥ catvāriṃśat yajūṃṣi
tat aśītiḥ annam aśītiḥ tat yat yat etat āha tat asmai annam aśītim kṛtvā prayacati
tena enam prīṇāti
atha stomabhāgau upadadhāti
etat vai prajāpateḥ etat annam indraḥ bhyadhyāyat saḥ

original: 'smādudacikramiṣattamabravītkathotkrāmasi kathā mā jahāsīti sa vai me 'syānnasya
analyzed: smāt udacikramiṣat tam abravīt kathā utkrāmasi kathā mā jahāsi iti sa vai me syāt nasya

original: rasam prayaceti tena vai mā saha prapadyasveti tatheti tasmā etasyānnasya rasam
analyzed: rasam prayaca iti tena vai mā saha prapadyasva iti tathā iti tasmai etasya annasya rasam
prāyacat tena enam saha prāpadyata

ayam eva sa yaḥ yam agniḥ cīyate yat tat annam etāḥ tāḥ candasyā

original: atha yaḥ so 'nnasya rasa etāstā stomabhāgā atha yaḥ sa indro 'sau sa ādityaḥ sa eṣa

original: eva stomo yaddhi kiṃ ca stuvata etameva tena stuvanti tasmā etasmai stomāyaitam

original: eṣa vai raśmirannaṃ raśmiretaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca

original: taddhaike / veṣaśrīḥ kṣatrāya kṣatraṃ jinveti triṃśattamīmupadadhati

tāni vai nānā prastāvāni
samāna nidhanāni tāni yat nānā prastāvāni nānā

original: hyapaśyannatha yatsamānanidhanānyekā hyeva yajñasya pratiṣṭhaikaṃ nidhanaṃ
analyzed: hi apaśyan atha yat samāna nidhanāni ekā hi eva yajñasya pratiṣṭhā ekam nidhanam
svargaḥ eva lokaḥ tasmāt svar jyotiḥ nidhanāni
atha enam hiraṇya śakalaiḥ prokṣati
atra eṣa sarvaḥ gniḥ saṃskṛtaḥ tasmin devā
etat amṛtam rūpam uttamadadhuḥ tathā eva asmin ayam etat amṛtam rūpam uttamam
dadhāti
yat u eva enam hiraṇya śakalaiḥ prokṣati
etat vai asmin adaḥ mūm purastāt ramyām

original: tanūm madhyato dadhāti rukbhaṃ ca puruṣaṃ
analyzed: tanūm madhyatas dadhāti rukbham ca puruṣam
ca atha enam etat sarvam eva upariṣṭāt ramyayā tanvā pracādayati
dvābhyām dvābhyām śatābhyām
dvipād yajamānaḥ yajamānaḥ
gniḥ yāvān agniḥ yāvatī asya mātrā tāvatā eva asmin etat amṛtam rūpam uttamam dadhāti

original: pañca kṛtvaḥ pañcacitiko 'gniḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
analyzed: pañca kṛtvas pañca citikaḥ gniḥ pañca ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
gniḥ yāvān āgnar yāvatī asya mātrā tāvatā eva asmin etat amṛtam rūpam uttamam dadhāti

original: sahasreṇa sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ sarveṇaivāsminnetadamṛtaṃ rūpamuttamaṃ dadhāti 8.7.4.[10]
analyzed: sahasreṇa sarvam vai sahasram sarveṇa eva asmin etat amṛtam rūpam uttamam dadhāti
paścāt agre prāṅ tiṣṭhan
atha uttaratas dakṣiṇā atha purastāt pratyaṅ atha jaghanena

original: parītya dakṣiṇata udaṅ tiṣṭhaṃstaddakṣiṇāvṛttaddhi devatrāthānuparītya paścātprāṅ
analyzed: parītya dakṣiṇatas udaṅ tiṣṭhan tat dakṣiṇāvṛt tat hi devatrā atha anuparītya paścāt prāṅ
tiṣṭhan tathā u ha asya etat prāk eva karma kṛtam bhavati
sahasrasya pramā asi

original: sahasrasya pratimāsi sahasrasyonmāsi sāhasro 'si sahasrāya tveti
analyzed: sahasrasya pratimā asi sahasrasya unmā asi sāhasraḥ si sahasrāya tvā iti

original: sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ sarvamasi sarvasmai tvetyetat 8.7.4.[12]
analyzed: sarvam vai sahasram sarvam asi sarvasmai tvā iti etat
atha atas citi purīṣāṇām eva mīmāṃsā

original: ayameva lokaḥ prathamā citiḥ paśavaḥ purīṣaṃ
analyzed: ayam eva lokaḥ prathamā citiḥ paśavaḥ purīṣam

original: yatprathamāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatīmaṃ tallokam paśubhiḥ pracādayati 8.7.4.[13]
analyzed: yat prathamām citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati imam tat lokam paśubhiḥ pracādayati
antarikṣam eva dvitīyā citiḥ
vayāṃsi purīṣam yat dvitīyām citim purīṣeṇa
pracādayati antarikṣam tat vayobhiḥ pracādayati
dyauḥ eva tṛtīyā citiḥ

original: nakṣatrāṇi purīṣaṃ yattṛtīyāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇi purīṣam yat tṛtīyām citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati
divam tat nakṣatraiḥ pracādayati
yajñaḥ eva caturthī citiḥ

original: dakṣiṇāḥ purīṣaṃ yaccaturthī citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati
analyzed: dakṣiṇāḥ purīṣam yat caturthī citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati
yajñam tad dakṣi nābhiḥ pracādayati
yajamānaḥ eva pañcamī citiḥ

original: prajā purīṣaṃ yatpañcamīṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati
analyzed: prajā purīṣam yat pañcamīm citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati
yajamānam tat prajayā pracādayati
svargaḥ eva lokaḥ ṣaṣṭhī citiḥ
devāḥ purīṣam yat ṣaṣṭhīm citim purīṣeṇa
pracādayati svargam tat lokam devaiḥ pracādayati

original: amṛtameva saptamī citiḥ tāmuttamāmupadadhātyamṛtaṃ tadasya sarvasyottamaṃ
analyzed: amṛtam eva saptamī citiḥ tām uttamām upadadhāti amṛtam tat asya sarvasya uttamam

original: dadhāti tasmādasya sarvasyāmṛtamuttamaṃ tasmāddevā anantarhitāstasmādu te 'mṛtā
analyzed: dadhāti tasmāt asya sarvasya amṛtam uttamam tasmāt devāḥ an antarhitāḥ tasmāt u te mṛtā
iti adhidevatam
atha adhyātmam
yā eva iyam pratiṣṭhā yaḥ ca ayam avāṅ prāṇaḥ sat prathamā citiḥ māṃsam

original: purīṣaṃ yatprathamāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatyetasya tadātmano māṃsaiḥ
analyzed: purīṣam yat prathamām citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati etasya tat ātmanaḥ māṃsaiḥ
saṃcādayati iṣṭakāḥ upadhāya asthi iṣṭakāḥ asthi tat māṃsaiḥ saṃcādayati
na adhastāt saṃcādayati tasmāt ime prāṇāḥ adhastāt a saṃcannāḥ upariṣṭāt tu
pracādayati etat asya tat ātmanaḥ upariṣṭāt māṃsaiḥ saṃcādayati tasmāt asya etat ātmanaḥ
upariṣṭāt māṃsaiḥ saṃcannam na avakāśate
yat ūrdhvam pratiṣṭhāyāḥ avācīnam madhyāt
tad dvitīyā citiḥ māṃsam purīṣam

original: yaddvitīyāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatyetadasya tadātmano māṃsaiḥ
analyzed: yat dvitīyām citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati etat asya tat ātmanaḥ māṃsaiḥ

original: saṃcādayatīṣṭakā upadhāyāsthīṣṭakā asthi tanmāṃsaiḥ saṃcādayati purīṣa
analyzed: saṃcādayati iṣṭakāḥ upadhāya asthi iṣṭakāḥ asthi tat māṃsaiḥ saṃcādayati purīṣa

original: upadadhāti purīṣeṇa pracādayatyetadasya tadātmana ubhayato māṃsaiḥ saṃcādayati
analyzed: upadadhāti purīṣeṇa pracādayati etat asya tat ātmanaḥ ubhayatas māṃsaiḥ saṃcādayati
tasmāt asya etat ātmanaḥ ubhayatas māṃsaiḥ saṃcannam na avakāśate
madhyamā iva tṛtīyā citiḥ
yat ūrdhvam madhyāt avācīnam grīvābhyaḥ tat caturthī

original: citirgrīvā eva pañcamī citiḥ śira eva ṣaṣṭhī citiḥ prāṇā eva saptamī
analyzed: citiḥ grīvāḥ eva pañcamī citiḥ śiraḥ eva ṣaṣṭhī citiḥ prāṇāḥ eva saptamī
citiḥ tām uttamām upadadhāti prāṇān tat asya sarvasya uttamān dadhāti tasmāt asya

original: sarvasya prāṇā uttamāḥ purīṣa upadadhāti māṃsaṃ vai purīṣam māṃsena
analyzed: sarvasya prāṇāḥ uttamāḥ purīṣe upadadhāti māṃsam vai purīṣam māṃsena
tat prāṇān pratiṣṭhāpayati na upariṣṭāt pracādayati tasmāt ime prāṇāḥ
upariṣṭāt a saṃcannāḥ
